data.title: ATTENDANCE
data.text: Maintains regular attendance with prior notification of absence. Consistently punctual.

data.title: APPEARANCE
data.text: Dresses appropriately. Is neat and clean. Hair is clean and neatly styled.

data.title: PROFESSIONALISM
data.text: Is dependable, responsible, shows initiative and acts honestly. Interacts appropriately with all staff.

data.title: COMMUNICATION
data.text: Communicates clearly, effectively and efficiently.  Includes all relevant employees in communcations.

data.title: TASK COMPLETION
data.text: Accurately and efficiently completes tasks. Team Player and works well individually. Seeks additional tasks.

data.title: QUALITY
data.text: Meets quality standards of work. Takes pride in their work product.
